judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
 ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION
 SUIT NO.691 OF 1977
 Popatlal Vadilal Shah .. Plaintiffs
 Vs.
 Mahendra Popatlal Shah .. Defendant
 Mr.Sabir i/b M/s.Nandlal Kothari & Sabir for the
 plaintiffs
 Ms.Thakkar i/b M/s.Rustamji & Ginwala for the
 defendant
 CORAM : S.U.KAMDAR, J
 CORAM : S.U.KAMDAR, J
 CORAM : S.U.KAMDAR, J
 DATED : 19TH JULY 2005
DATED : 19TH JULY 2005
DATED : 19TH JULY 2005

 P.C.:
 . The learned counsel for the defendants
 states that the suit is already been disposed of on
 19.6.90. In view thereof, suit does not survive.
 Accordingly, suit be removed from the list of
 arrears.
